page.title: 20TRANSPORT IN S.CROYDON
page.content: Due to the hilly nature of the area, and the fact that there are large expanses of woodland and open space,there is an unequal distribution of transport facilities throughout S.Croydon. The main valley runs N _ S and is used by the old A23 and main railway line to the south coast.No other railway runs through the Block.Bus routes are very largely limited to the west,as there are few roads which cut across from E _ W. {CREDITS} The information on this D Block was compiled by pupils from:_ Haling Manor High School Purley Oaks Junior Mixed & Infant Sch. Ridgeway Junior School
